abstract: The federal government proposes to allow a small number of existing uranium and other hard rock mining operations in the region to continue while barring all new mining claims.
snippet: The federal government proposes to allow a small number of existing uranium and other hard rock mining operations in the region to continue while barring all new mining claims.

headline.main: Interior Backs Mining Limits Near Grand Canyon
headline.print_headline: Comment Period Begins on Mining Moratorium
